resume.skillmessage: I am passionate about building full stack software applications

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Implemented the auto-pricing service to increase/decrease the prices of the tools in JAVA which increased the total number of quotations generated in each quarter and improved the overall win-rate of the quotations by 80% and increased the quarterly revenue generated by 56%

projects.title: Chatroom Web App

testimonials.text: The solution prepared by Anand Kulkarni was very good & matching the requirement. We received the solution within the given timeline. We would like to hire Anand again for our future tasks.
